General.Name: Rights and Issues Investment Trust Public Limited Company
General.Description: Rights and Issues Investment Trust Public Limited Company is a self-managed investment trust. The firm invests in public equity markets of the United Kingdom. It invests in stocks of small-cap companies. The firm benchmarks the performance of its portfolio against the FTSE All share index. Rights and Issues Investment Trust Public Limited Company was founded in 1963 and is based in London, United Kingdom.
General.Address: Hamilton Centre, Chelmsford, United Kingdom, CM1 3BY
